name: GU Salted Watermelon Gel
description: Salt and watermelon certainly make strange bedfellows, but it works. This quirky, yet delicious flavour combo is engineered to give your body the fuel it needs, and keep you in play longer.Ingredients: Maltodextrin, water, fructose, leucine, sea salt, citric acid, natural flavor, potassium citrate, sodium citrate, calcium carbonate, valine, green tea (leaf) extract (contains caffeine), gellan gum, isoleucine, sunflower oil, sodium benzoate (preservative), potassium sorbate (preservative).Complex and simple carbs are optimized for rapid absorption and energy accessibility.Caffeine for an extra boost of energy.
